Constructor Detail

Assembler

public Assembler()
Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Fires off the assembler with run(). This function makes sure that an argument has been passed-in before running the assembler.

getNextAvailableAddress

public static int getNextAvailableAddress()
Will return the next available slot in the RAM that a variable can occupy. This does not check for overflow.

setNextAvailableAddress

public static void setNextAvailableAddress(int nextAddress)
Sets the next available address.

getAddress

public static int getAddress(java.lang.String symbol)
Returns the address associated with the symbol.

run

public static void run(java.lang.String fileName)
This is the implementation of the assembler. It contains a timer accurate to the nano-second to measure the assembler's performance.
